sentences.sContent: All offers of help will be greatly appreciated .
The quality of health care varies greatly .
sentences.sCn: 医疗保健服务质量差别很大。

sentences.sContent: ...The radio business has changed greatly and now attracts more listeners...
...and news radio greatly enlarged their audiences...
...the beautiful words and sentences flowing in the pages of excellent literature can greatly ease our tiredness...
...Sales of these foods have greatly increased in recent years...
...the benefits of online shopping greatly outweigh its drawbacks...
...What happened in a drug store that greatly annoyed the speaker...
...The construction of “a green campus” will greatly stimulate students to take part in various environmental protection activities...
...It goes without saying that various activities brought by modern technology have greatly broadened our horizon and brought much excitement to us...

words.tran: 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的
